message.body: Hey there. Allison here. Thank you so much for facilitating such an incredible experience. I really hope Jeremy is feeling better. And that your bus ride is relaxing. All my love.
Also if your bird on the ride. Download the app space paint. It's so much fun ï¿¼
Mwah! 'twas so lovely to see you and so glad you enjoyed it! Jeremy is tip top. Hope to see you both again soon!
Awesome! It's yr true aura shining thru!
